title: Establishes the "New York state consumers' right to repair act of 2011"
summary: Establishes the "New York state consumers' right to repair act of 2011" which mandates automobile manufacturers to release vehicle repair information to vehicle owners allowing such owners to choose among competing repair facilities for the convenient, reliable and affordable repair of their motor vehicles.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to mandating automobile manufacturers to release vehicle repair information to vehicle owners
